question:
who played john clark sr on nypd blue

I will think about the cast of the show and identify the actor who portrayed this character. Answer: John Clark Sr. was played by actor Mark Paul Gosselaar on "NYPD Blue."

Born in St. John's, Newfoundland, Clark grew up in Brooklyn, New York, in an area now known as Park Slope. He is a veteran NYPD Detective First Grade and television Writer and Executive Producer. Clark joined David Milch and Steven Bochco's "NYPD Blue" in the first season as technical consultant and continued to draw on his twenty-five years experience with New York undercover and homicide units to ensure that the series accurately and realistically portrayed the work of New York City detectives.
